version_description:
- Adds color mode scanning
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

- Change app name to Tiny Scanner+
- Minor bug fixes

- Change app name to Tiny Scanner+
- Minor bug fixes

Introducing brand-new Tiny Scanner Plus 5.0. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Empowered and fastered scan experience;
- Redesigned a much simpler way of organizing scans;
- Deeply optimized Tiny Scanner for iPhone XS and iOS 12.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

- Redesigned a much simpler way of organizing scans;
- Deeply optimized Tiny Scanner for iPhone XS and iOS 12.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing brand-new Tiny Scanner 5.0. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Empowered and fastered scan experience;
- Redesigned a much simpler way of organizing scans;
- Deeply optimized Tiny Scanner for iPhone XS and iOS 12.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing Tiny Scanner Pro 5.1. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Redesigned a more efficient way of organizing scans;
- Redesigned a much simpler sharing interface.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing Tiny Scanner Pro 5.1.1. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Optimized the scan frame to the ratio of 4:3. What you see is now what you get;
- Preset the default document size to A4.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Introducing "Batch Processing". When scanning or importing a document with hundreds of pages (like a book), you are now able to efficiently apply identical filters or skip "Border Detection" to the entire document at a time.
- Adjusted the "Page Size" Setting. You can now rapidly change the exporting PDF document size by the "A4" (default) button on the right top side of the document edit page.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Applied entirely redesigned document processing engine. Documents you scanned will be more rapidly processed and in better quality. Also, you are now able to adjust the brightness and contrast.
- Added a greatly expected feature that editing previously saved documents is now supported.
- Added a feature that moving and deleting pages are now supported when viewing the entire document.
- Added a feature that one-tap Select All is supported when multi-selecting documents.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Applied entirely redesigned document processing engine. Documents you scanned will be more rapidly processed and in better quality. Also, you are now able to adjust the brightness and contrast.
- Added a greatly expected feature that editing previously saved documents is now supported.

- Added a feature that one-tap Select All is supported when multi-selecting documents.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements:
- Brand new design explicitly optimized for iPad.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Swedish is now well supported.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

- Added Help in settings for some using tips.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

- Set default page size into "letter".

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Added brand-new Auto Shutter mode. Border detection, automatic shutter, smoothly in one go.
- Added grid lines when scanning.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Added 4 new beautiful icons. Go to Settings > App Icon to pick your favorite.
- Set default Scan Mode to Manual.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

In this update, we fixed minor bugs and optimized your experience.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We keep improving your experience through various performance improvements that you may not necessarily notice, including:
- Optimized experience on the new iOS 14.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We keep improving your experience through various performance improvements that you may not necessarily notice, including:
- Fixed minor bugs and optimized experience on the new iOS 14.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We keep improving your experience through various performance improvements that you may not necessarily notice, including:
- Updated login method of Google Drive;
- Fixed minor bugs.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We redesigned the entire Tiny Scanner, including:
- Added OCR(Optical Character Recognition) to recognize words in documents;
- Added Auto Scan feature which takes shots when pages recognized;
- Added Signature feature which enables you to put your signature anywhere on scanned documents;
- Added Translation feature which enables you to translate recognized words of scanned documents into lots of languages;
- Redesigned your using experience;
- Fixed minor bugs.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.
